articles.author: Marc Caputo
articles.title: The rare minerals battle behind Rubio's ban on Chinese students - Axios
articles.description: The decision to target as many as 280,000 Chinese students — and throw another complication into the ongoing trade talks with China — reflects how crucial rare minerals are to the U.S. tech industry.
articles.content: When Secretary of State Marco Rubio abruptly announced plans Wednesday to cancel the visas of all Chinese students in the U.S., the Trump administration was quick to cast it as a way to root out spie… [+5705 chars]
